update.sql: alter table MatriculationExamEnrollment modify column name varchar(255) null default null;
alter table MatriculationExamEnrollment modify column ssn varchar(255) null default null;
alter table MatriculationExamEnrollment modify column email varchar(255) null default null;
alter table MatriculationExamEnrollment modify column phone varchar(255) null default null;
alter table MatriculationExamEnrollment modify column address varchar(255) null default null;
alter table MatriculationExamEnrollment modify column city varchar(255) null default null;
alter table MatriculationExamEnrollment modify column guider varchar(255) null default null;
alter table MatriculationExamEnrollment modify column enrollAs varchar(255) null default null;
alter table MatriculationExamEnrollment modify column numMandatoryCourses integer null default null;
alter table MatriculationExamEnrollment modify column location varchar(255) null default null;
alter table MatriculationExamEnrollment modify column message longtext null default null;
